name: Green S
status: Unpermitted (Banned in Canada, Finland, Japan, Norway, Sweden and the US.)
foods: Desserts, gravy granules, ice cream, mint sauce, sweets, packet breadcrumbs, cake mixes and tinned peas.
notice: Known to cause hyperactivity, asthma, uticaria, and insomnia. HACSG recommends to avoid it.
info: A green synthetic coal tar dye.
